comments.body: Could you add a few simple comments here? e.g, what `gapDuration` stands for.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@ *                    no new element appeared within "the last element in session + gap".
 */
case class SessionWindow(timeColumn: Expression, gapDuration: Long) extends UnaryExpression
  with ImplicitCastInputTypes
  with Unevaluable
